name: Tyrania Enforcers - (Prologue Demo)
description:
Tyrania Enforcers - (Prologue Demo)

"The world where I live in is a world ravaged by crime and terrorism..."

Centuries ago, our ancestors fought against oppression for one of the most fundamental of needs, freedom. Today, that freedom is now synonymous to pleasure. Such is the law of society. Linda, a beautiful reporter, lives a life without too much of a worry. However as time passes, a feeling of emptiness builds up inside of her as she follows the journey of a small team of soldiers. Slowly, Linda will learn the truth about this world and the fake peace that she has always enjoyed. She will have to accept that actions matter more than sharing posts about peace and love, and that meaningful accomplishments don't flourish from a meaningless life of entertainment.  For Linda, her views about this society come to be questioned as the ever growing problem of crime and terrorism becomes omnipresent. Beyond this illusory peace, war is brewing between the Empire and the Union, an ideological conflict between defending the rights of criminal and their complete eradication.

"There is no such thing as peace as long as there are criminals."

IMPORTANT INFO

  1. The story is set in the same world as my first visual novel, but it is not required to read the first story to understand this one. This is an early demo, so the full release will probably be till 2022 or 2023. I will post progress and updates on my twitter: https://twitter.com/EdoTyrania
  2. If you want to know more about the world setting, here is my first visual novel : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1217490/Tyrania__A_Kinetic_Visual_Novel/
  3. To change language, in preferences, select french or english.
